code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     connectionPool = new MockAS400ConnectionPool().     super.setUp(). }
@After public void tearDown() throws Exception {     super.tearDown().     if (connectionPool != null) {         connectionPool.close().     } }

@Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     ObjectHelper.notNull(connectionPool, "connectionPool").     JndiRegistry registry = super.createRegistry().     registry.bind("mockPool", connectionPool).     return registry. }

comment: /**  * Returns the mock connection pool.  *  * @return the mock connection pool  */
code: /**  * Returns the mock connection pool.  *  * @return the mock connection pool  */ public AS400ConnectionPool getConnectionPool() {     return connectionPool. }
